JOB EXPERIENCE
I have gained the following knowledge during my first attachment at M’Big ltd-Bungoma 
County: 
i)
Site Management: how site should be managed, prepared and organized during and 
after the construction process.
ii)
Concrete works and its classes: different types of concrete works and the various 
types of concrete classes such as C15- 1:1.5:3.
iii)
Drawing Interpretation: Interpreting the Architectural drawing for the purpose of 
coming up with the BQ and making the client understand the drawing.
iv)
Preparation of tender documents: tenders brought in the office for the purpose of 
construction work and  how they are prepared for the project
v)
 Preparation of material estimates: to give the construction estimate cost to help the 
client to decide whether or not to proceed with the project.
vi)
Preparation of Bill of Quantities (BQ’s): After the Interpretation of Architectural 
drawing, the Quantity Surveyor come up with the Bill of Quantity which he uses to 
prepare the material estimate for the project.
